title: So Many Dinosaurs
description: So Many Dinosaurs is a great and fun way for kids to explore differences. This book lets them explore the world of dinosaurs and how one dinosaur differs from the other. From long-neck dinosaurs to plated dinosaurs, from carnivores to herbivores. So Many Dinosaurs is easy to read and is great for beginning readers. Also included at the end of this book as bonus are some really great dinosaur jokes that children are sure to love!
author: N.V. Smith
